articles.title: New volatile sunspot grows 4 times bigger than the Earth; Will it unleash a solar storm? - HT Tech
articles.description: A new sunspot has emerged on the Sun, which has grown overnight to gain a size four times the size of the Earth. The sunspot likely harbors an unstable magnetic field and can explode, sparking a solar storm.
